description: Non-material amendments pursuant to planning permission 16/6074/FUL dated 08/08/2017 for Erection of a two storey leisure centre (Use Class D2 of the Town and Country Planning (Use Classes) Order 1987 (as amended)) of 5,175 sqm on land to west of the existing Barnet Copthall Leisure Centre, Champions Way, Mill Hill, incorporating swimming, fitness suite, studios, changing facilities, 5 court sports hall, ancillary offices and welfare acilities, reception, cafe and plant, refurbishment and enlargement of the existing car park, demolition of the Copthall Green Spaces Depot, demolition of the existing Barnet Copthall Leisure Centre and return the site to open space, and associated landscaping. Amendments include the wording for condition 28 needs to be changed to amend the trigger.  The wording should read detailed drawings to be submitted within 3 months of completion of demolition of the existing leisure centre building and completion of said works. 6 -12 months following approval thereof.
